name: STALL (Oscura)
description:
STALL

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Short Public Toilet, Horror Experience

My First Attempt At Horror Made In A Few Weeks For Newgrounds Halloween 2022

Thanks To Julian (J-Roc) For The Music And Such.

Edit: Fixed A Few Problems And Such That Would Break The Game

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

"WASD" - Movement

"Mouse Movement" - Look Around + Move Door When Interacting

"Tab" Or "Escape" - Pause/ Setting Menu

"E" - Interact
